description: This unit introduces students to senior secondary curriculum in physical education. The unit builds on method knowledge embedded within previous units in the course. It provides students with essential skills, knowledge and understanding to critically engage and extend political, academic and professional debates related to worthwhile and essential knowledge within senior secondary physical education and how this knowledge is translated into pedagogical practice in the classroom. National and international senior secondary curriculum documents provide students with a focus for learning including the opportunity to develop, implement and enact units of work that are conceptually coherent with regard to curriculum pedagogy and assessment. Students develop understanding of assessment, its moderation and interpretation, and how to use various assessment strategies in the classroom.
